attributes.additional_details:
Duwayne Brooks has just given an interview to Sky News saying that another innocent person (Duggan) has been shot dead by the Police. How dare he say that when the IPCC have yet to release an official statement regarding the FULL investigation into the circumstances regarding his death!

Disgraceful behaviour - he needs to be singing from the same songsheet as the rest of the Government or get out!
We are all entitled to our own opinions but this could be a catalyst for the trouble to start again.
He obviously has issues that need dealing with!
